name: Three Little Pigs (itch) (masterhuhu)
description:
The Three Little Pigs is a short 2D Adventure Game with pixel art in the style of a children’s drawing. You play as the antagonist - the BEAR in the well-known children’s tale Three Little Pigs.

It might destroy your childhood but who really cares at this point :)

Instructions (if you aren't gamer enough)

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

SPACE - Interact

E - Use Item

R - Restart
